EmailTemplate.name: Alert Account Owner of a new Project Request
EmailTemplate.subject: New Project Request from {!Project_Request__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Project_Request__c.OwnerFirstName},
{!Project_Request__c.Account__c} has submitted a new Project Request:
{!Project_Request__c.Link}
Please follow up with them to initiate the intake and staffing process.
